channel.title: Running with my Ip
channel.description:
Hey, I'm really starting to get frustrated because my Router is different. And it doesn't have an Applications/Gaming tab with my static Ip in a broswer. And it doesn't work anywhere, in any option's.
So i was wondering if someone could please tell me how to run it off my Normal Ip. Or where i should put the no-ip thing.
In the setup menu there is:
[ul][li]PPP[/li] [li]User Profiles[/li] [li]WAN Interface[/li] [li]Host[/li] [li]DHCP[/li] [li]Admin User[/li] [li]Time Client[/li] [li]Static Routes[/li] [li]NAT/NAPT[/li] [li]Port Fowarding[/li] [li]Firewall[/li] [li]UPnP[/li] [li]RIP[/li] [li]Server Ports[/li] [li]Dynamic DNS[/li][/ul]
Does anyone know what one it should be Placed it? *NOTE* I have done the portfowarding Tutorial.
Thank you.

item.title: Running with my Ip
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Yeah I’ve done it about 100 times.

Read full topic

item.title: Running with my Ip

item.description:
@croranger wrote:

go on portforward.com and find ur router there and u will see a tut for it

Read full topic

item.title: Running with my Ip
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Ahh, it comes up with " NAPT server IP address is not a valid host LAN address. "

This is so…

Read full topic

item.title: Running with my Ip
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

Dont enter your ip, Enter your default gateway.

Read full topic

item.title: Running with my Ip
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Lol ok, what then?

If i enter my ip and then TCP/UDP port(s):as 43594-5555.
Select service by name: SMTP

  • OR -
    Select protocol : TCP

It comes up with " NAPT server IP address is not a valid host LAN address. "

Read full topic

item.title: Running with my Ip
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Hey, I’m really starting to get frustrated because my Router is different. And it doesn’t have an Applications/Gaming tab with my static Ip in a broswer.
And it doesn’t work anywhere, in any option’s.

So i was wondering if someone could please tell me how to run it off my Normal Ip. Or where i should put the no-ip thing.

In the setup menu there is:

[ul][li]PPP[/li]
[li]User Profiles[/li]
[li]WAN Interface[/li]
[li]Host[/li]
[li]DHCP[/li]
[li]Admin User[/li]
[li]Time Client[/li]
[li]Static Routes[/li]
[li]NAT/NAPT[/li]
[li]Port Fowarding[/li]
[li]Firewall[/li]
[li]UPnP[/li]

Does anyone know what one it should be Placed it?
